{{cpp/chrono/year/title|operator+{{=}}|operator-{{=}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/year/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=1|1=
constexpr std::chrono::year&amp; operator+=( const std::chrono::years&amp; y ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=2|1=
constexpr std::chrono::year&amp; operator-=( const std::chrono::years&amp; y ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Adds or subtracts {{c|y.count()}} years from the year value.
@1@ Equivalent to {{c|1=*this = *this + y;}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|1=*this = *this - y;}}.

===Return value===
A reference to this {{tt|year}} after modification.

===Notes===
If the result would be outside the range {{closed range|-32767|32767}}, the actual stored value is unspecified.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    using namespace std::literals::chrono_literals;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;

    std::chrono::year y{2020};
 
    y += std::chrono::years(12);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (y == 2032y) &lt;&lt; ' ';

    y -= std::chrono::years(33);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (y == 1999y) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=true true
}}
